text:
San Francisco, CA (SOMA)

Thumbtack - Marketplace for local services

Wrapping up a series A round and expanding rapidly. We're looking to build product and scale web/mobile applications. We're looking for front-end and back-end engineers, as well as interaction designers. If you can program for the modern web and are looking to change the world, this might be a good place for you. Bonus: we also have a phenomenal chef who cooks mouth-watering meals every day.

thumbtack.com/jobs or email me: chris at.
